Solo laser sailor Fiona Heenan claims world record in Northland after 600km trip https://www.nzherald.co.nz/northern-advocate/news/solo-laser-sailor-fiona-heenan-clairs-world-record-world-record-in-northland-after-after-600km-trip/32nrrrcnrrcnfknztke2tca2tca2tca2tca ta https://www.nzherald.co.nz/northern-advocate/news/solo-laser-sailor-fiona-heenan-clairs-world-record-world-record-in-northland-after-after-600km-trip/32nrrrcnrrcnfknztke2tca2tca2tca2tca ta Sarah CurtisFiona Heenan has set a world record for the longest distance sailed by a woman in a dinghy Mon, 10 Mar 2025 03:00:00 +0000 Fiona Heenan's record-setting sailing attempt started with a grey day in Auckland harbour and finished about three weeks later in the sun and surf on Northland's picturesque Puheke Beach. Photos / Supplied and NZ Herald Graphics
